entry.title: Marginal Utlity for Planning in Large Action Spaces

link.title: Marginal Utlity for Planning in Large Action Spaces

entry.content: In this post I discuss our paper that is going to be presented at NeurIPS 2020. A short video presentation providing a brief overview can be found here and the full paper can be found at this link.
